name: Gummy Gush: Match 3 Puzzle
description:
Save the Gummy Bears with your Pet Cat in over 950+ fun match 3 puzzle levels. Work your way through increasingly challenging puzzles and gain the boosters to help you in your Gummy Gush adventure. Download & Play Now!

Gummy Gush is a fun, new match 3 style puzzle game developed by TapBlaze!

HIGHLIGHTS
• TONS OF LEVELS
- Over 950 awesome levels! Updates will be continued!

• UNIQUE GAME WORLDS
- Explore unique game worlds, each with their own stories and characters.
- Collect your favorite characters to get free boosters!

• CHALLENGING AND FUN PLAY
- Gather powerful boosters to beat the toughest stages.
- Connect with Facebook to get help from friends.

HOW TO PLAY
• Swap and Match at least 3 gummy candies of the same type to burst!
• Make unique combinations to get gummy bombs.
• Use gummy bombs to remove the gummy candies as many as you can!
• Aim to use the least moves to achieve goal!
• Play more levels to activate new characters and collect boosters!
• Achieve 3 stars for each level to get more boosters!
• Leverage powerful boosters to help clear obstacles!

NOTES
• Please note that Gummy Gush is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. In addition, Gummy Gush allows you to link to social media services such as Facebook, which is optional.

• Under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Gummy Gush.

Privacy Policy:

Have fun playing Gummy Gush!
